text: Ollie Imogene "Jean" Shepard (November 21, 1933 – September 25, 2016) was an American honky-tonk singer-songwriter. Shepard released a total of 73 singles to the Hot Country Songs chart. She recorded a total of 24 studio albums between 1956 and 1981, and became a member of the Grand Ole Opry in 1955.Grand Ole Opry.com. Grand Ole Opry members – Jean Shepard retrieved June 20, 2008. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:American country singers Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Singers from Oklahoma Category:Writers from Oklahoma
title: Jean Shepard
